targets.expr: (max by (printer_address, n) (prusa_temp_noz{printer_address="$printer_address"}) and on(printer_address) (changes(prusa_temp_noz{printer_address="$printer_address"}[30s]) > 0)) or (avg by (printer_address) (prusa_temperature_celsius{printer_address="$printer_address",printer_heated_element="tool0"}))

panels.description: Validity of data need more testing
panels.title: Power consumption (!)
